globalFeedback.feedback:
Hey! After reviewing the project, it looks like there aren't any chat interactions, tasks completed, or report content available. This means we don't have any record of your communication, what work was accomplished, or the final output.

For future projects, ensuring you actively participate in discussions, track your progress, and document your work in a report is essential for demonstrating your contribution and the team's effort. These elements are key to showcasing your involvement.
